sub_title: Chief Technical Officer | Co-owner @ Solvy | Speaker | Events organizer
summary:
Technical lead / Architect / IT Consultant / Expert Laravel, Symfony, Drupal developer / Certified Scrum Master / Certified Magento Developer

As a technical lead I am responsible for the technical delivery of projects, development processes in the company, technical vision and turning it into reality. Developing the strategy for the key customers, presenting it and driving the change.

Expert developer, good team player with high communication skills, passionate, enthusiastic, inventive. Solid track record of implemented projects.

My motto: always do the job, like you do it for yourself.
My professional goal: steady daily development as an IT professional considering growing impact of the IT in every branch of modern society

I have experience in PHP-related commercial projects since 2004.
CMS: Drupal 5 and higher, Magento, Joomla, Wordpress, Sapid.

Additional information:
Certified Scrum Master
Certified Magento Developer
Interests in management and business (MBA graduate)
Drupal Association individual member
Drupal User Group Minsk organizer

Specialties: Drupal 6/7/8

projects.title: SKVR
projects.description:
New website implementing with Drupal 8 and Drupal Commerce 2. 

The website includes commerce and content parts.

Commerce part provides:
- The possibility of faceted search by products based on Search API Solr and Facet API modules.
- The subscription system - any product is a course/lessons that customer can subscribe.
- Advanced user profile that allows to add the person who pays and students
- Microsoft Navision integration via web services - all products are imported from Microsoft Nav, all orders are also processed there.
- iDeal Payment Gateway that enables customers to pay online through their own bank with popular online payment method.
- Stock management feature.
- Flexible discount system.

Content part allows:
- Add news and agenda items.
- Add text pages with any information.
- Add accordions, Google locations, images with cropping

For the frontend workflow component-driven development approach is used via principles of Pattern Lab and atomic design. Pattern Lab templates re-used for the Drupal theme.

projects.title: Breda University of Applied Sciences
projects.description:
Drupal 8 content website and lead generation platform for BUAS.

Breda University of Applied Sciences is a vocational university in Breda, Netherlands. It was founded in 1966 with the merger of two educational institutions. Since, the university has increased in the number of staff, students and programmes offered. According to the annual report in 2017 there were 7,398 students from over 70 countries studying in the university in different types of programmes offered both in English and Dutch.

projects.title: Nederlandse Vereniging van Ziekenhuizen
projects.description:
Drupal 8 project for NVZ. Rich content management functionality, deep integration with Maximizer CRM in terms of user management, lead generation, newsletter subscription, events management and subscription.

The Dutch Association of Hospitals ( NVZ ) is an association that represents the collective interests of Dutch hospitals and other organizations that offer specialist medical care. The NVZ does this through policy development, lobbying and consultation with other parties in the field. In addition, the association supports individual members by providing information on topics related to medical care. Members can also submit individual issues to the NVZ for advice. Furthermore, a general members' meeting is held at least twice a year and the NVZ organizes discussion meetings for its members.

projects.title: Exact migration project
projects.description:
Migrating Exact country sites to the single www.exact.com domain, including switching to new professional secure hosting platform, usability adjustments, performance optimizations, custom components development to ensure Joomla to handle working in DTAP-street, extending native caching mechanisms, implementing custom content workflow, etc. Working in close collaboration with Exact using Agile methodology.

Exact is a Dutch software company that offers accounting, ERP, and other software for small and medium enterprises. Exact develops cloud-based and on-premises software for industries such as accountancy, wholesale distribution, professional services and manufacturing, serving more than 100,000 companies.

projects.title: Hornbach Profiservice
projects.description:
Award Winning project: Netherlands Splash Awards in category "Apps/Tools". 
Profiservice portal is a project for one of the largest DIY supermarket chains in Germany and Netherlands: Hornbach. It includes loyalty platform with the possibility to pay in Hornbach supermarkets with the special card. You can repay your purchases afterwards through the portal as well. 
The portal functionality includes: user management, cards management, transactions processing, repayments.
Integrations: iDEAL payment system, Worldline transaction processing, Focum afterpay, DCP card issuer.
Technologies: Angular front-end, Drupal 8 as API and integrations layer.

Hornbach is a German DIY-store chain offering home improvement and do-it-yourself goods. Until March 2014, it was 21% owned by Kingfisher plc, a UK company, who also own the B&Q and Castorama DIY chains. Kingfisher sold off the interests as it was planning expansion in new markets that would be in direct competition with Hornbach. Kingfisher has since launched its Screwfix stores in Germany and Brico Dépôt stores in Romania, where Hornbach operates.
In the full fiscal-year 2007/2008 the net profit slumped 24% to 48 Mio. € after the company spent more on advertising and new stores.

projects.title: Rutgers WPF | Seksualiteit.nl
projects.description:
The World Population Foundation (WPF) was founded in 1987 in the Netherlands by Diana and Roy W Brown. Their purpose was to create an organisation to draw attention to the effects of high birth rates and rapid population growth on maternal and infant mortality, communities and the environment, and to raise funds for population projects and programmes, with the ultimate aim of reducing world poverty and improving the quality of life of the world’s poorest people.

From 1987 until 1994, WPF was a small organisation mainly supported by donations from the founders and by consultancy assignments. In 1994, the WPF played an important role in the Dutch delegation of the International Conference on Population and Development in Cairo, Egypt. At this conference, the Cairo Programme of Action was adopted which still serves as a foundation for WPF’s work.

WPF works to reduce maternal and infant mortality, and improve sexual health and reproductive rights. It acknowledges that attention for these themes and to the improvement of services will contribute to the struggle against poverty worldwide. Therefore WPF advocates the implementation of these themes in the UN's Millennium Development Goals.

2006-2009, the World Population Foundation's board members include Nafis Sadik, former Executive Director of UNFPA. As of 1 January 2011, Rutgers Nisso Groep and World Population Foundation (WPF) have merged under the new name Rutgers WPF. Chair of Rutgers WPF is Bert Koenders, former minister for Development Cooperation of the Netherlands.

projects.title: Nederland Schoon
projects.description:
Nederland Schoon is an organisation found to prevent litter in the Netherlands. It carries out campaigns against litter, do research, advising companies and put catchy actions. 
Nederland Schoon organizes activities for the public, schools, municipalities and industry and want to draw people to not only their own waste to throw away neatly but occasionally something extra to do. 
Nederland Schoon's premise is simple: if we keep it clean, we do not have to clean it.

projects.title: Buienalarm
projects.description: Buienalarm is an application for your smartphone (iOS or Android). Buienalarm can alert you in time for storms in your immediate area. In addition to the app that is downloadable from Google Play (Android version) and in the App Store (iOS version), now we also have a website with various functionalities. On the homepage you can read the daily forecast. Additionally, you can see 2 hour, 24 hour and 7 day forecasts for any location. These predictions are supported by a visual that shows the amount of precipitation.

projects.title: Colours - BVED
projects.description:
Bved.nl is het contentplatform voor de online professional die zich wil ontwikkelen in 2015. Iedere maand staan ze stil bij een specifiek onderwerp. Naast dat alle inschrijvingen voorzien zijn van het nieuwe hoofdstuk uit het boekje, gaan ze op het betreffende onderwerp ook dieper in met extra content. De nadruk ligt daarin op het tonen van onze expertise middels praktijkervaringen, anekdotes (“toen ik…”), voorbeelden etc.

Om meer naamsbekendheid te generen en uiteindelijk ook meer leads, heeft Colours begin 2015 het boekje van eigen deeg uitgebracht. Om dit verder door te zetten wilt Colours een contentplatform opzetten waarbij ze in combinatie met de ‘release’ van een nieuw hoofdstuk unieke content plaatsen.

profile_positions.description:
Teaming up with our clients, we create advanced and effective web solutions, having simplicity in mind.

My current focus is team development, internal process improvements, consultancy on enterprise architectures and business processes digitalisation.
profile_positions.title: Chief Technical Officer | Co-owner

profile_positions.description:
In my daily operations I have both internal and external responsibilities.
Internally I am responsible for:
- Development and delivery process, tooling, quality, guidelines
- Technical improvements process to ensure professional development as a team and each team member personally
- Being a bridge between business and technical team to ensure the team understands and works towards reaching business goal
- Taking part in strategy meetings to work on long-term development of the PHP direction within the company
Externally I am responsible for full cycle project development and consultancy:
- Pitches
- Definition phase of the project, high-level architecture, advice on solutions according to customers' business goals
- Creating the best-fit team for particular project (together with PM/Resource manager)
- Project development, delivery and optimization
- All-round customer communication which require technical or web-related advice

Besides, I enjoy promoting open-source culture within the organization and outside, by speaking at numerous conferences and leading several open-source community initiatives: organizing and running Drupal User Group in Minsk, Belarus and being one of the co-organizers of Drupal Camp Belarus.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description: As a technical lead I am responsible for the technical delivery of projects, development processes in the company, technical vision and turning it into reality. My another important focus is people -  coaching and mentoring the team, managing team expectations and removing impediments. Daily engaged both with Business and the team to ensure permanent growth in the quality of delivered products and the satisfaction level of my colleagues and team mates on their working places.
